A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didn't get much of a tingle at all watching this.  Story was hard to follow\, lacked any big moments whatsoever\, and was basically all lack luster and poorly thought out.\n\nEDIT:  Rewatched this recently\, and it's straight garbage.  Honestly never thought I'd watch it again\, but COVID happened\, so I'm bored.  The plot makes zero sense\, there's no payoff whatsoever\, and then it ends.  This movie is a hot mess.
